author: RTÉ News
title: Ofcom to assess 5G-virus conspiracy comments on ITV
description: Britain's media regulator Ofcom is assessing a programme on ITV after presenter Eamonn Holmes questioned why the mainstream media had slapped down a conspiracy theory linking the spread of the coronavirus to 5G masts.
content:
Britain's media regulator Ofcom is assessing a programme on ITV after a presenter questioned why the mainstream media had slapped down a conspiracy theory linking the spread of the coronavirus to 5G masts. 
Eamonn Holmes said on yesterday’s This Morning show… [+1987 chars]
